languages.text: "Вы делаете смелую ставку, {name}. Ставку на то, что интересность вашей персоны перевешивает ценность персоны господина ван Калокса в моих глазах. И на то, что я с годами не приобрел сентиментальной тяги мстить за своих людей. Что ж. Пока что ваше предположение верно".

traits.locale_text: "Осторожно, госпо{mf|дин|жа} фон Валанциус. С годами я стал сентиментален и мстителен. Привязываюсь к своим людям, а потом мщу за них..."

languages.text: "That is a bold assertion you're making, {name}. You assume that I am more interested in your person than in the demise of Master van Calox. And that, with age, I have not developed a sentimental habit of avenging my people's deaths. Well then. You are correct — this time."
languages.original_text: "Вы делаете смелую ставку, {name}. Ставку на то, что интересность вашей персоны перевешивает ценность персоны господина ван Калокса в моих глазах. И на то, что я с годами не приобрел сентиментальной тяги мстить за своих людей. Что ж. Пока что ваше предположение верно".

traits.locale_text: "That is a bold bet you're making, {name}. A bet that the interestingness of your person outweighs the value of Master van Calox in my eyes. And that, with age, I haven't developed a sentimental habit of avenging my people's deaths. Well then, your bet has paid off for now."

"That is a bold bet you're making, {name}. A bet that the interestingness of your person outweighs the value of Master van Calox in my eyes. And that, with age, I haven't developed a sentimental habit of avenging my people's deaths. Well then, your bet has paid off for now."

"That is a bold assertion you're making, {name}. You assume that I am more interested in your person than in the demise of Master van Calox. And that, with age, I have not developed a sentimental habit of avenging my people's deaths. Well then. You are correct — this time."

languages.text: 「大層な主張をしてくれるな、{name}。私の関心は、マスター・ヴァン・カロックスの死亡より、お前という人物にあると考えているのか。確かに、年をとるにつれて部下の死に復讐心を燃やす癖も落ち着きつつある。そうだな。お前は正しい、今回は」
languages.original_text: "That is a bold assertion you're making, {name}. You assume that I am more interested in your person than in the demise of Master van Calox. And that, with age, I have not developed a sentimental habit of avenging my people's deaths. Well then. You are correct — this time."

traits.locale_text: 「大層な主張をしてくれるな、{name}。私の関心は、マスター・ヴァン・カロックスの死亡より、お前という人物にあると考えているのか。確かに、年をとるにつれて部下の死に復讐心を燃やす癖も落ち着きつつある。そうだな。お前は正しい、今回は」

languages.original_text: "That is a bold assertion you're making, . You assume that I am more interested in your person than in the demise of Master van Calox. And that, with age, I have not developed a sentimental habit of avenging my people's deaths. Well then. You are correct — this time."

languages.text: “真是胆大包天的发言啊，{name}。莫非你以为，我对你本人怀着兴趣，所以冯·卡洛克斯大师的死就微不足道了吗？不过确实，即使年岁渐长，我也没有变得越来越多愁善感，非要替手下报仇不可。很好，算你说对了，但只是这次而已。”
languages.original_text: "That is a bold assertion you're making, {name}. You assume that I am more interested in your person than in the demise of Master van Calox. And that, with age, I have not developed a sentimental habit of avenging my people's deaths. Well then. You are correct — this time."

traits.locale_text: “真是胆大包天的发言啊，{name}。莫非你以为，我对你本人怀着兴趣，所以冯·卡洛克斯大师的死就微不足道了吗？不过确实，即使年岁渐长，我也没有变得越来越多愁善感，非要替手下报仇不可。很好，算你说对了，但只是这次而已。”

languages.text: «Es una declaración atrevida, {name}. Supone que me interesa más su persona que la muerte del maestro van Calox. Y también que con la edad no he desarrollado la sensiblera costumbre de vengar la muerte de mis agentes. Bueno. Tiene razón... esta vez».
languages.original_text: "That is a bold assertion you're making, {name}. You assume that I am more interested in your person than in the demise of Master van Calox. And that, with age, I have not developed a sentimental habit of avenging my people's deaths. Well then. You are correct — this time."

traits.locale_text: «Es una declaración atrevida, {name}. Supone que me interesa más su persona que la muerte del maestro van Calox. Y también que con la edad no he desarrollado la sensiblera costumbre de vengar la muerte de mis agentes. Bueno. Tiene razón... esta vez».

languages.text: « Vous ne manquez pas d'audace, {name}. Cependant, vous semblez croire que votre petite personne m'intéresse plus que la disparition de maître van Calox et qu'avec l'âge, j'aurais possiblement perdu le goût de venger la mort de mes hommes. Eh bien... vous avez raison. Pour cette fois. »
languages.original_text: "That is a bold assertion you're making, {name}. You assume that I am more interested in your person than in the demise of Master van Calox. And that, with age, I have not developed a sentimental habit of avenging my people's deaths. Well then. You are correct — this time."

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne manquez pas d'audace, {name}. Cependant, vous semblez croire que votre petite personne m'intéresse plus que la disparition de maître van Calox et qu'avec l'âge, j'aurais possiblement perdu le goût de venger la mort de mes hommes. Eh bien... vous avez raison. Pour cette fois. »

languages.text: "Das ist eine gewagte Annahme, {name}. Ihr geht davon aus, dass mich Eure Person mehr interessiert als der Tod von Meister van Calox. Und dass ich im Alter nicht die sentimentale Eigenart entwickelt habe, den Tod meiner Leute zu rächen. Nun ... Ihr habt recht – dieses Mal."
languages.original_text: "That is a bold assertion you're making, {name}. You assume that I am more interested in your person than in the demise of Master van Calox. And that, with age, I have not developed a sentimental habit of avenging my people's deaths. Well then. You are correct — this time."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist eine gewagte Annahme, {name}. Ihr geht davon aus, dass mich Eure Person mehr interessiert als der Tod von Meister van Calox. Und dass ich im Alter nicht die sentimentale Eigenart entwickelt habe, den Tod meiner Leute zu rächen. Nun ... Ihr habt recht – dieses Mal."

languages.text: "Cüretkâr bir varsayımda bulunuyorsun {name}. Benim seninle, Üstat van Calox'un ölümünden daha fazla ilgilendiğimi varsayıyorsun. Ayrıca yaşım ilerledikçe maiyetimdekilerin ölümlerinin intikamını almak gibi duygusal bir alışkanlık edinmediğimi de. Bu seferlik haklısın."
languages.original_text: "That is a bold assertion you're making, {name}. You assume that I am more interested in your person than in the demise of Master van Calox. And that, with age, I have not developed a sentimental habit of avenging my people's deaths. Well then. You are correct — this time."

traits.locale_text: "Cüretkâr bir varsayımda bulunuyorsun {name}. Benim seninle, Üstat van Calox'un ölümünden daha fazla ilgilendiğimi varsayıyorsun. Ayrıca yaşım ilerledikçe maiyetimdekilerin ölümlerinin intikamını almak gibi duygusal bir alışkanlık edinmediğimi de. Eğer öyleyse, aslında haklısın. Bu seferlik."
